snippet: The lyrics of the chestnut “The Wheel of the Wagon Is Broken” mourn an Old West irretrievably passed.
lead_paragraph: The lyrics of the chestnut “The Wheel of the Wagon Is Broken” mourn an Old West irretrievably passed.

headline.main: The Old West, Exalted in Bronze
headline.print_headline: The Old West, Exalted in Bronze
